dict.acceptation: 裙子；边缘；（连衣裙、外衣等的）下摆；（车辆或机器基座的）挡板；
位于…的边缘；沿…的边缘走；绕开；避开；

sent.orig: They also brought to English many words that begin with sk, like sky and skirt.
sent.trans: 他们也将许多以sk开头的词带到英语中来，如sky（天空）和skirt（裙子）。

sent.orig: Her blouse doesn't go with her skirt/Her blouse and skirt don't go (together).
sent.trans: 她的衬衫和裙子不协调。

sent.orig: Skirt: I have a pink skirt.
sent.trans: 裙子：我有一条粉红色的裙子。

sent.orig: A skirt worn under another skirt a petticoat.
sent.trans: 穿在另外一件裙子的外面的裙子。

sent.orig: As far as I'm concerned, I don't mind those you wear the mini-skirt.
sent.trans: 就我一自己而言，我不介意你穿这件迷你裙。
